description.full: This game was classified by the community with the following category scores - Violence=0/3, Sex=0/3, Mature Content=0/3. All prisoner's are encouraged to participate in prison experiments. Successful completion of any experiment will grant you early release from your stay here. Unfortunately, unsuccessful completion is usually the result of death. For this reason, we will thank you in advance. Good luck!
